page.title: 08Meriden-Housing.
page.content:
Meriden lies in Green Belt land, so any housing development in the area is strictly controlled. The village contains a mixture of council and privately owned dwellings, and has developed in a linear fashion along the length of the old Birmingham to Coventry road.
Any new housing development in the area is either "infill" in the existing development, or it involves the construction of new property on land which was originally built on, but where the dwelling that stood there has been demolished.
